description: Information on how new developments in London might require changes to TfL's bus network

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["How new developments in London might require changes to the bus network."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

These documents deal with specific locations. The strategic background for the work can be found in the Mayor's Transport Strategy and in our Bus service planning guidelines . The financial background can be found in TfL's Business Plan .
Bus route ideas are indicative and subject to further development.Â Any definitive proposals can be found on our consultations website .
We regularly publish summaries of temporary bus route changes and permanent bus route changes . Statistics on the wider transport network are provided in the annual Travel in London report .
